oai_dc:dc.dc:title: H2020 and its relations to the EIP agriculture: Funding opportunities for research and innovation in the organic farming sector
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Montero Aparicio, Andrés
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation summarizes the funding opportunities that the Spanish organic research sector will have in the following years within the European Horizon 2020. It could be a great chance to researchers to increase their internationalization and strengthing their presence at the European framework.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Montero Aparicio, Andrés (2014) H2020 and its relations to the EIP agriculture: Funding opportunities for research and innovation in the organic farming sector. Keynote presentation at: II Jornada Agriecol, Madrid (Spain), 10 Diciembre 2014. [Unpublished]
